#!/bin/bash
shopt -s nocasematch
query="{query}" [ $query = "{query}" ] && query="$@"
current=$(/usr/local/bin/SwitchAudioSource -c)
IFS=$'\n' echo '<?xml version="1.0"?>' echo '<items>' for device in $(/usr/local/bin/SwitchAudioSource -a); do state="" [[ $device =~ $current ]] && state=" - current" if [[ -n $query && ! $device =~ $query ]]; then continue fi cat <<_END_OF_ITEM_ <item uid="$device" arg="$device"> <title>$device</title> <subtitle>set $device$state</subtitle> </item> _END_OF_ITEM_ done echo '</items>'

#!/bin/bash query="{query}" [ $query = "{query}" ] && query="$@" device="$(echo $query | sed -e 's/ (input)$//' -e 's/ (output)$//')" if [[ $query =~ (input) ]]; then type=input else type=output fi if [ -x /usr/local/bin/SwitchAudioSource ]; then /usr/local/bin/SwitchAudioSource -t $type -s "$device" elif [ -x "$(which SwitchAudioSource)" ]; then SwitchAudioSource -t $type -s "$device" fi

# alfred-switch-audio
![Version](https://img.shields.io/github/tag/uchida/alfred-switch-audio.svg?maxAge=2592000) [![License](https://img.shields.io/github/license/uchida/alfred-switch-audio.svg?maxAge=2592000)](https://tldrlegal.com/license/creative-commons-cc0-1.0-universal) [![CircleCI](https://img.shields.io/circleci/project/uchida/alfred-switch-audio.svg?maxAge=2592000)](https://circleci.com/gh/uchida/alfred-switch-audio)
## Description
This is an Alfred 2 workflow that makes it easy to switch input/output audio devices by [switchaudio-osx](https://github.com/deweller/switchaudio-osx)
## Usage
0. (Preparation) Install [switchaudio-osx](https://github.com/deweller/switchaudio-osx) and ensure SwitchAudioSource in your PATH 1. Type `audio` into Alfred followed by a space. 2. Begin typing the name of the device you want to switch. 3. When you see the device you want, select it from the list as usual. 4. Press return to switch device.
## Installation
Download latest `alfred-switch-audio.alfredworkflow` from [Release page](https://github.com/uchida/alfred-switch-audio/releases). Open `alfred-switch-audio.alfredworkflow` with Alfred.
